entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
